text: L6.7. Applying Amdahl's Law Assume that a program spends its time only in ALU operations and Memory operations. You are told that an application spends 49% of its time in the ALU and takes 352 seconds to complete. What speedup will we produce if we make the memory system 1.5 times faster? Round your answer to two decimal digits. number (2 digits after decimal) speedup @ Save & Grade Single attempt Ad(ditional attempts available with new variants @
